thread.title: Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication in Texas
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication in Texas

author: Tribune wire reports
title: Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication in Texas
text:
Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication in Texas Shia LaBeouf Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP 
Jail records show Shia LaBeouf was booked Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, night into the Travis County Jail and released on his own recognizance. 
Jail records show Shia LaBeouf was booked Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, night into the Travis County Jail and released on his own recognizance. (Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP) Tribune wire reports Contact Reporter 
Actor Shia LaBeouf has been arrested and charged with public intoxication after an incident in Austin, Texas. 
Jail records show LaBeouf was booked Friday night into the Travis County Jail and released on his own recognizance. No attorney was listed on the record. 
He was arrested in the city's Sixth Street entertainment district. The Austin City Limits music festival is taking place there through Sunday. 
Police have not responded to a request from The Associated Press for additional details. His publicist did not immediately respond to a request for comment on the arrest. 
The Associated Press
